roadmaps.title: SDE-1 (Software Development Engineer)
roadmaps.description: The definitive path to becoming a Software Development Engineer at top product-based companies.
steps: Master one programming language (C++/Java/Python)
Complete DSA Roadmap
Learn Core CS Subjects (OS, DBMS, CN)
Build 2-3 strong projects (e.g., E-commerce site, Web Scraper)
Learn System Design basics
Prepare your resume and practice mock interviews

roadmaps.title: Data Scientist
roadmaps.description: A step-by-step guide to landing a job in the exciting field of Data Science.
steps: Learn Python and its data science libraries (Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, Matplotlib)
Master Statistics and Probability
Understand Machine Learning algorithms (Supervised, Unsupervised)
Learn Deep Learning concepts (Neural Networks, TensorFlow/PyTorch)
Build a portfolio of data science projects
Learn SQL for data manipulation and querying

roadmaps.title: Cybersecurity Analyst
roadmaps.description: Your roadmap to becoming a defender of digital systems and networks.
steps: Build a strong foundation in Computer Networks and Operating Systems
Learn about common security principles and threats
Master at least one scripting language (Python is recommended)
Get hands-on with tools like Wireshark, Nmap, Metasploit
Study for certifications like CompTIA Security+ or CEH
Participate in Capture The Flag (CTF) competitions

roadmaps.title: Frontend Developer
roadmaps.description: The path to becoming a master of user interfaces and web experiences.
steps: Learn HTML, CSS, and JavaScript fundamentals
Master a modern JavaScript framework (React, Angular, or Vue.js)
Understand state management and API integration
Build responsive and accessible web pages
Learn build tools like Webpack or Vite
Create a portfolio with 3-5 diverse projects

roadmaps.title: Backend Developer
roadmaps.description: A roadmap for building the server-side logic and databases that power applications.
steps: Choose a backend language (Python, Node.js, Java, Go, Ruby)
Learn a web framework (e.g., Django, Express.js, Spring)
Understand database management (SQL and NoSQL)
Learn RESTful API design and implementation
Master version control with Git
Deploy your applications to the cloud

roadmaps.title: Full Stack Developer
roadmaps.description: A comprehensive guide to becoming proficient in both frontend and backend development.
steps: Complete the Frontend and Backend Developer roadmaps
Integrate frontend and backend applications using APIs
Learn about authentication and authorization
Understand CI/CD pipelines
Familiarize yourself with containerization (Docker)
Build and deploy a full-stack application

roadmaps.title: DevOps Engineer
roadmaps.description: The route to bridging the gap between development and operations for seamless delivery.
steps: Learn Linux fundamentals and command line interface
Master a scripting language (Bash, Python)
Understand CI/CD principles and tools (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab CI)
Learn containerization with Docker and orchestration with Kubernetes
Get familiar with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP)
Learn infrastructure as code (IaC) with tools like Terraform

roadmaps.title: Android Developer (Kotlin)
roadmaps.description: A roadmap for creating native mobile applications for the Android platform.
steps: Learn Kotlin programming language
Understand Android SDK and Android Studio
Learn about UI design with XML layouts and Jetpack Compose
Understand data persistence (SQLite, Room)
Learn about RESTful APIs and networking
Build and publish a personal app on the Google Play Store

roadmaps.title: iOS Developer (Swift)
roadmaps.description: The definitive path to building native apps for iPhones and iPads.
steps: Learn Swift programming language
Familiarize yourself with Xcode and Apple's development ecosystem
Master UI development with SwiftUI or UIKit
Learn about Core Data for data storage
Understand concurrency and networking
Build and publish an app on the Apple App Store

roadmaps.title: Cloud Engineer (AWS)
roadmaps.description: A focused plan to become an expert in building and managing cloud infrastructure.
steps: Understand core cloud concepts and AWS services (EC2, S3, VPC)
Study for the AWS Certified Solutions Architect â€“ Associate exam
Learn infrastructure as code with CloudFormation or Terraform
Master container services (ECS/EKS)
Understand serverless computing with AWS Lambda
Gain experience with monitoring and logging tools (CloudWatch)

roadmaps.title: Machine Learning Engineer
roadmaps.description: A guide for those who want to build and deploy ML models into production systems.
steps: Master Python and core data science libraries (Numpy, Pandas, Scikit-learn)
Learn about different ML models and their applications
Understand data preprocessing and feature engineering
Learn about model deployment and MLOps principles
Gain experience with frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch
Build end-to-end ML projects and add them to a portfolio

roadmaps.title: React Developer
roadmaps.description: Your journey to becoming a proficient React.js developer.
steps: Master JavaScript (ES6+ features)
Understand React fundamentals (Components, Props, State)
Learn Hooks (useState, useEffect, useContext)
Get familiar with a state management library (Redux, Zustand)
Practice building with React Router for navigation
Integrate with APIs using fetch or Axios

roadmaps.title: Angular Developer
roadmaps.description: A structured path to learning the Angular framework.
steps: Learn TypeScript fundamentals
Understand Angular CLI and its command-line tools
Master components, services, and dependency injection
Learn about routing and forms
Practice with RxJS for reactive programming
Build a single-page application (SPA)

roadmaps.title: Vue.js Developer
roadmaps.description: A roadmap to becoming a skilled Vue.js developer.
steps: Master JavaScript fundamentals
Understand Vue.js core concepts (Components, Directives)
Learn about state management with Pinia or Vuex
Practice building with Vue Router
Get familiar with the Composition API
Build several projects to solidify your skills

roadmaps.title: Svelte Developer
roadmaps.description: A guide to building lightning-fast web applications with Svelte.
steps: Master HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Understand how Svelte compiles code and its reactivity model
Learn about components, props, and state
Build applications using SvelteKit
Learn about store management
Create interactive and dynamic web pages

roadmaps.title: Node.js (Express.js) Developer
roadmaps.description: A guide to building scalable backend services with Node.js.
steps: Master JavaScript for the server-side
Understand Node.js event loop and asynchronous nature
Learn to build APIs with Express.js
Connect to a database (e.g., MongoDB, PostgreSQL)
Implement authentication with JWTs
Practice error handling and logging

roadmaps.title: Django Developer
roadmaps.description: A roadmap for creating powerful web applications with the Python-based Django framework.
steps: Learn Python programming language
Understand Django's MVT (Model-View-Template) architecture
Master the Django ORM for database interaction
Learn to use Django's built-in Admin panel
Build RESTful APIs with Django REST Framework
Deploy a Django application to a cloud server

roadmaps.title: Spring Boot (Java) Developer
roadmaps.description: The path to building robust enterprise applications with Spring Boot.
steps: Learn Core Java concepts and OOP
Understand Spring Framework basics (IoC, DI)
Learn to build REST APIs with Spring Boot
Master data access with Spring Data JPA
Understand dependency management with Maven or Gradle
Practice unit and integration testing

roadmaps.title: Ruby on Rails Developer
roadmaps.description: A guide to becoming proficient in the convention-over-configuration framework.
steps: Learn Ruby programming language
Understand the Rails MVC architecture
Master ActiveRecord for database interactions
Learn about routing and forms
Practice building full-stack web applications
Get familiar with RSpec for testing

roadmaps.title: ASP.NET Core Developer
roadmaps.description: The journey to building cross-platform web apps with Microsoft's framework.
steps: Learn C# programming language
Understand the .NET Core ecosystem
Learn to build web APIs with ASP.NET Core
Master Entity Framework Core for data access
Get familiar with Razor Pages or MVC
Practice building and deploying web applications

roadmaps.title: React Native Developer
roadmaps.description: A roadmap for building cross-platform mobile apps using JavaScript.
steps: Master JavaScript and React fundamentals
Understand React Native components and styling
Learn state management for mobile apps
Integrate device features (camera, GPS)
Practice with Expo CLI and React Native CLI
Build a full-featured mobile app

roadmaps.title: Flutter Developer
roadmaps.description: The path to creating beautiful, natively compiled apps for mobile, web, and desktop from a single codebase.
steps: Learn Dart programming language
Understand the widget tree concept in Flutter
Learn state management (Provider, Riverpod, Bloc)
Integrate with Firebase for backend services
Practice building responsive UI for different screen sizes
Publish an app on both the Google Play and Apple App Stores

roadmaps.title: Data Engineer
roadmaps.description: A roadmap to designing and building systems for collecting, managing, and converting raw data into usable information.
steps: Master Python or Scala for data processing
Learn SQL for querying and managing databases
Understand ETL/ELT concepts
Get familiar with cloud data warehouses (e.g., Snowflake, BigQuery)
Learn about data orchestration tools (e.g., Apache Airflow)
Build a data pipeline project from scratch

roadmaps.title: Big Data Engineer
roadmaps.description: A focused plan for working with large datasets and distributed systems.
steps: Master data engineering fundamentals
Learn about the Hadoop ecosystem (HDFS, MapReduce)
Get hands-on with Apache Spark for large-scale data processing
Understand NoSQL databases (e.g., Cassandra, HBase)
Familiarize yourself with streaming data technologies (Kafka, Flink)
Practice optimizing performance for big data workloads

roadmaps.title: Data Analyst
roadmaps.description: A guide to collecting, processing, and performing statistical analysis on data to inform business decisions.
steps: Master SQL for data extraction and manipulation
Learn Python or R for data analysis and visualization
Understand statistical analysis and hypothesis testing
Get proficient with data visualization tools (Tableau, Power BI)
Learn to create clear and compelling reports and dashboards
Work on case studies and real-world datasets

roadmaps.title: Unity Game Developer
roadmaps.description: The path to building 2D and 3D games with the popular Unity engine.
steps: Learn C# programming language
Understand the Unity editor and core concepts (GameObjects, Components)
Master scripting in Unity for game logic
Learn about physics, animations, and particle systems
Practice with asset integration and scene management
Build and publish a small game

roadmaps.title: Unreal Engine Game Developer
roadmaps.description: A roadmap to creating high-fidelity games with the powerful Unreal Engine.
steps: Learn C++ programming language
Understand the Unreal Engine editor and its features
Master Blueprint visual scripting for rapid prototyping
Learn about rendering, lighting, and materials
Practice creating interactive environments and gameplay mechanics
Build a demo project or a short playable game

roadmaps.title: Penetration Tester / Ethical Hacker
roadmaps.description: A guide to legally testing the security of systems and networks to find vulnerabilities.
steps: Master networking fundamentals (TCP/IP, OSI Model)
Learn about reconnaissance and scanning tools (Nmap)
Understand common web vulnerabilities (OWASP Top 10)
Practice with exploitation frameworks (Metasploit)
Study for certifications like OSCP or eJPT
Participate in bug bounty programs

roadmaps.title: Incident Responder
roadmaps.description: The path to becoming a first responder to security breaches and cyberattacks.
steps: Build a strong foundation in cybersecurity and networking
Learn about digital forensics tools (Wireshark, FTK Imager)
Understand the incident response lifecycle (NIST framework)
Practice analyzing logs and network traffic to identify threats
Study for certifications like GCIH or GIAC
Participate in simulated cyberattack exercises

roadmaps.title: Blockchain Developer
roadmaps.description: A guide to building decentralized applications (dApps) and smart contracts.
steps: Understand blockchain fundamentals (public/private keys, hashing)
Learn Solidity programming language for Ethereum
Get familiar with development tools (Truffle, Hardhat)
Learn about web3.js or ethers.js to interact with the blockchain
Understand token standards (ERC-20, ERC-721)
Build a simple dApp like a decentralized voting system

roadmaps.title: Smart Contract Auditor
roadmaps.description: The path to specializing in securing smart contracts by identifying vulnerabilities.
steps: Master blockchain development fundamentals and Solidity
Learn about common smart contract vulnerabilities (reentrancy, integer overflow)
Get familiar with security tools (Slither, Mythril)
Study past security incidents and hacks
Practice auditing open-source smart contracts
Develop a portfolio of audit reports

roadmaps.title: Python Developer
roadmaps.description: A comprehensive roadmap for mastering the versatile Python language.
steps: Master Python fundamentals (syntax, data types, control flow)
Understand object-oriented programming (OOP) in Python
Learn to use popular libraries (Requests, BeautifulSoup, Pandas)
Practice building projects (Web Scraper, REST API, CLI tool)
Learn about testing frameworks (pytest, unittest)
Get familiar with virtual environments and package managers

roadmaps.title: C++ Developer
roadmaps.description: A structured path to becoming a proficient C++ developer for high-performance applications.
steps: Master C++ fundamentals (pointers, memory management)
Understand object-oriented programming (OOP) concepts
Learn about the Standard Template Library (STL)
Practice with modern C++ features (C++11, C++14, etc.)
Learn about data structures and algorithms
Build projects that require high performance

roadmaps.title: Go (Golang) Developer
roadmaps.description: A roadmap for building simple, reliable, and efficient software with Go.
steps: Master Go fundamentals (syntax, concurrency)
Understand interfaces and structs
Learn to build REST APIs with Go
Get familiar with Go modules and package management
Practice with Go's standard library
Build a microservice or a network-based application

roadmaps.title: Rust Developer
roadmaps.description: The path to building safe and performant applications with Rust.
steps: Understand Rust's ownership model and borrowing
Learn about traits and generics
Master error handling with `Result` and `Option`
Get familiar with Cargo and the crate ecosystem
Practice building CLI tools or web backends
Learn about concurrency in Rust

roadmaps.title: Java Developer
roadmaps.description: A guide to mastering the widely-used Java programming language.
steps: Master Java syntax and Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) concepts
Learn about the Java Collections Framework
Understand multithreading and concurrency
Get familiar with build tools like Maven or Gradle
Practice with Spring Framework for enterprise applications
Work on personal projects to gain hands-on experience

roadmaps.title: C# Developer
roadmaps.description: A roadmap for building a variety of applications using C# and the .NET ecosystem.
steps: Master C# fundamentals and OOP principles
Understand the .NET framework and .NET Core
Learn to use Visual Studio for development
Get familiar with ASP.NET for web development or Unity for games
Practice with LINQ for data manipulation
Build and deploy a desktop, web, or game application

roadmaps.title: Competitive Programmer
roadmaps.description: The roadmap to mastering algorithms and data structures for competitive programming contests.
steps: Master C++ or Java programming languages
Learn core data structures (Arrays, Linked Lists, Trees, Graphs)
Understand key algorithms (Sorting, Searching, Dynamic Programming)
Practice on platforms like Codeforces, LeetCode, or HackerRank
Learn about time and space complexity analysis
Participate in contests regularly

roadmaps.title: Technical Writer
roadmaps.description: A guide to creating clear and concise technical documentation and content.
steps: Develop strong writing and communication skills
Understand how to explain complex topics simply
Learn about documentation tools (Markdown, Sphinx, GitBook)
Get familiar with a version control system like Git
Build a portfolio of writing samples (tutorials, API docs)
Contribute to open-source documentation

roadmaps.title: UI/UX Designer
roadmaps.description: The path to designing user-friendly and aesthetically pleasing digital products.
steps: Understand core design principles and human-computer interaction
Learn about user research and journey mapping
Master design tools (Figma, Sketch, Adobe XD)
Create wireframes, mockups, and prototypes
Learn about usability testing and A/B testing
Build a portfolio of design projects

roadmaps.title: Quality Assurance (QA) Engineer
roadmaps.description: A roadmap to ensuring the quality and reliability of software products.
steps: Learn software development lifecycle (SDLC) and QA methodologies
Understand different types of testing (manual, automated, regression)
Learn a scripting language for test automation (e.g., Python, JavaScript)
Get familiar with test automation frameworks (Selenium, Cypress)
Master bug tracking tools (Jira, Trello)
Practice writing test cases and test plans

roadmaps.title: Site Reliability Engineer (SRE)
roadmaps.description: A guide to building highly reliable and scalable systems.
steps: Master Linux and networking fundamentals
Learn a scripting language (Python, Go)
Understand monitoring and alerting tools (Prometheus, Grafana)
Get familiar with CI/CD and automation
Learn about container orchestration (Kubernetes)
Practice incident response and post-mortems

roadmaps.title: Cloud Architect
roadmaps.description: A roadmap for designing and implementing scalable cloud solutions.
steps: Gain deep knowledge of one or more cloud providers (AWS, Azure, GCP)
Master core services (compute, storage, networking, database)
Learn about security best practices in the cloud
Understand microservices architecture and serverless computing
Get certified (e.g., AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Professional)
Practice designing complex systems for real-world scenarios

roadmaps.title: System Administrator
roadmaps.description: The path to managing and maintaining computer systems and servers.
steps: Master Linux or Windows Server administration
Learn about networking protocols and hardware
Understand system security and user management
Get familiar with scripting for automation (Bash, PowerShell)
Learn about virtualization and containerization
Practice with monitoring and troubleshooting tools

roadmaps.title: Database Administrator (DBA)
roadmaps.description: A guide to managing and maintaining database systems.
steps: Master SQL and database theory
Learn about different database systems (MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle)
Understand database design, normalization, and indexing
Practice with backup and recovery strategies
Get familiar with performance tuning and optimization
Learn about database security and user permissions

roadmaps.title: AI/ML Ethicist
roadmaps.description: A roadmap to ensuring responsible development of AI and machine learning systems.
steps: Gain a strong understanding of AI/ML fundamentals
Study ethical frameworks and principles for technology
Learn about AI bias and fairness
Understand data privacy and security regulations (e.g., GDPR)
Collaborate with AI engineers and policymakers
Analyze case studies of ethical issues in AI

roadmaps.title: AR/VR Developer
roadmaps.description: The path to building immersive augmented and virtual reality experiences.
steps: Learn C# and the Unity engine or C++ and Unreal Engine
Understand 3D modeling and asset creation
Get familiar with AR/VR SDKs (e.g., ARKit, OpenXR)
Master UI/UX design for immersive environments
Practice with physics and spatial audio
Build a demo or interactive experience

roadmaps.title: Embedded Systems Engineer
roadmaps.description: A guide to building software for embedded systems and hardware.
steps: Master C and C++ programming languages
Understand microcontrollers and hardware components
Learn about real-time operating systems (RTOS)
Practice with circuit design and schematics
Get hands-on with a development board (Arduino, Raspberry Pi)
Work on projects involving robotics or IoT

roadmaps.title: Network Engineer
roadmaps.description: A roadmap for designing, implementing, and managing computer networks.
steps: Master networking fundamentals (TCP/IP, OSI Model)
Learn about routing and switching protocols
Get familiar with network hardware (routers, switches)
Study for certifications like CCNA or Network+
Learn network security principles
Practice troubleshooting network issues

roadmaps.title: Systems Analyst
roadmaps.description: The path to analyzing and designing information systems to solve business problems.
steps: Understand business processes and requirements gathering
Learn about data modeling and process mapping
Master project management principles
Get familiar with system design and architecture
Practice with flowcharts and UML diagrams
Develop strong communication skills to bridge tech and business teams

roadmaps.title: Robotics Engineer
roadmaps.description: A guide to designing, building, and programming robots.
steps: Master C++ or Python programming
Understand electronics and circuit design
Learn about control systems and kinematics
Get familiar with Robot Operating System (ROS)
Practice with robot simulation tools
Build a small robot or automation project

roadmaps.title: Quantum Computing Engineer
roadmaps.description: A forward-looking roadmap for entering the field of quantum computing.
steps: Master linear algebra and quantum mechanics basics
Learn about qubits and quantum gates
Get familiar with a quantum programming language (Qiskit, Cirq)
Understand quantum algorithms (Grover's, Shor's)
Practice with a quantum simulator
Work on a project to solve a small problem using quantum computing
